articles.title: Flowit: Dieses Pitchdeck überzeugte Carsten Maschmeyer
articles.description: Im Juni gewann Flowit den Swiss Economic Award. Jetzt schloss das Startup eine Seed-Finanzierung über mehrere Millionen ab. Seht hier das Pitchdeck.
articles.content: Wie kann man Mitarbeitende an ein Unternehmen binden? Wenn es nach dem Schweizer Startup Flowit geht, durch individuelle Weiterentwicklung und stetiges Feedback zur Mitarbeiterzufriedenheit. Flowit i… [+2433 chars]

articles.author: Peter Kafka
articles.title: Radio usage remains surprisingly high because of cars
articles.description: The internet is killing TV, and it will get to radio. But not quite yet.
articles.content: Radio is an old-timey medium that made sense when there was no other way to listen to things. But it makes no sense in the age of Spotify and podcasts and listening to what you want, when you want to… [+2522 chars]

articles.author: Nora Naughton
articles.title: GM and Ford's gas-powered profits are a problem for Tesla's EV slowdown
articles.description: Companies like GM and Ford can rely on hybrids and gas-powered cars to get through the EV slowdown. Tesla can't do that.
articles.content:
Tesla is finally being forced to reckon with a slowdown in electric-vehicle demand, and CEO Elon Musk's tactics are likely to look different than his peers' in the automotive industry.
Both Ford and… [+2634 chars]

articles.title: Ford patents car that can repossess itself and drive back to showroom
articles.description: A new patent allows Ford to build cars that take action if the owner falls behind on payments by playing annoying sounds – or even driving themselves back to the seller
articles.content:
By Matthew Sparkes
Ford wants to build cars that repossess themselves, although the technology can’t be used on current models like the Ford Puma
